page.title: 15WORK IN CLYST HONITON.
page.content: There are not a lot of{jobs in the {village of Clyst Honiton,}but there are some. Most people travel to work in Exeter .The largest employer is the airport and the industrial estate adjacent to it. There is a milk marketing board breeding centre in the village and three local people work there. A few people work in Nurseries and market gardening business .About three people do bed and breakfast.Two people work in a furniture business in the village and there is an antique exporter. A couple of people run a taxi service and a van hire.There is a bus company which transports pupils to school.There is also an outdoor pursuits equipment manufacturer. There is a thatcher,a builder and carpenter in the village.
